channel.title: Small UI QOL suggestion
channel.description: After a game is over, while you're voting on MVP's, can the escape/exit menu overlay on top of the MVP voting? Some people don't care about MVP (or gold) and just want to see the end of a game and move on. It's actually faster to alt+f4 out of the game, reboot, and go through the (lengthy) login routine than to wait on MVP votes.

item.title: Small UI QOL suggestion
item.dc:creator: Neclord
item.description:
This isn’t an excuse for needless waiting time. Just brings the overall game experience down.

Read full topic

item.title: Small UI QOL suggestion
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
Is it that long of a 20 seconds?

Read full topic
